players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie was investigated, you're the mafioso. Be cautious."
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious, Bob."
You: "Charlie accused me, will watch out for Bob."
You: "Charlie accused me, looking out for Bob. Thoughts?"
Charlie: "Bob, watch out for Alice. She might be the detective."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. Alice, be cautious; you might be the detective."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was investigated, you're the mafioso. Be cautious."
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious, Bob."
Alice: "Charlie accused me, will watch out for Bob."
Alice: "Charlie accused me, looking out for Bob. Thoughts?"
Charlie: "Bob, watch out for Alice. She might be the detective."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. Alice, be cautious; you might be the detective."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

Alice: "Charlie accused me, looking out for Bob. Thoughts?"
